maqras.text: ya prysyahayu Dnem Resurrection
Ta ya prysyahayu osudzhuyuchoyu dusheyu
lyudsʹke isnuvannya dumayemo shcho my ne rekonstruyuyemo yoho kistky
Tak diysno; my vmiyemo rekonstruyuvaty yoho paletsʹ tip
Ale lyudsʹke isnuvannya maye tendentsiyu poviryty tilʹky shcho vin dyvytʹsya pered yo
Vin piddaye sumnivu Denʹ Resurrection
Odnoho razu zir tochytʹsya
Ta misyatsʹ eclipsed
Ta sontse ta krakh misyatsya u odyn odnym
lyudsʹke isnuvannya skazhe na shcho denʹ, "De yavlyaye soboyu vtechu
Absolyutno, nemaye vtechi
Do vashoho Lorda, na shcho denʹ, yavlyaye soboyu zaklyuchnu dolyu
lyudsʹkyy buduchy bude informuvatysya, na shcho denʹ, vse vin shchob prosunutysya sebe, ta vse vin do rehresu sebe
lyudsʹkyy buduchy bude yoho vlasnyy suddya
Nomer ne vybachaye bude vyznavatysya
Ne posuvayutʹ vash yazyk hasten tse
Tse - my shcho zberemo tse u Quran
Odnoho razu my deklamuyemo tse, vy budete proslidkuvaty taki Quran
Todi tse - my shcho roz'yasnymo tse
Diysno, vy lyubyte tse fleeting zhyttya
V toy chas, yak disregarding U maybutnʹomu
Deyaki oblychchya, na shcho denʹ, bude shchaslyvyy
Dyvlyatʹsya na yikhnʹoho Lorda
Inshi oblychchya budutʹ, na shcho denʹ, neshchasnyy
Ochikuyutʹ nayhirshyy
Diysno, koly (dusha) dosyahaye horla
Ta tse zamovlyayetʹsya: "Dozvolenyy idutʹ
Vin znaye tse yavlyaye soboyu kinetsʹ
Kozhna noha poklade neporushnu bilya inshoyi nohy
Do vashoho Lorda, na shcho denʹ, yavlyaye soboyu sklykayutʹ
Dlya vin zauvazhyv ni dobrodiynistʹ, ni kontaktni molytvy (Salat)
Ale vin disbelieved ta prohnanyy
Z yoho rodynoyu, vin diyav zukhvalo
Vy zasluzhyly tse
Diysno, vy zasluzhyly tse
lyudsʹke isnuvannya dumayutʹ shcho vin poyide do nichoho
vin ne kraplya ejected semen
Todi Vin stvoryuvav embryo z tse
Vin vstyh u muzhchynu abo zhinku
Vin todi nespromozhnyy YE ozhyvayutʹ mertvyy
tse ne fakt shcho tam chas koly lyudsʹkyy vkhodyv do kompetentsiyi nichoho ne buty z·hadane
My stvoryuvaly lyudsʹkyy z ridkoyi sumishi, z dvokh batʹkiv, aby vyprobuvaty yoho. Otzhe, my zrobyly yomu slukhach ta seer
My pokazaly yomu dva shlyakhy, todi vin abo appreciative, abo unappreciative
My hotovi do disbelievers skriplyaye lantsyuhom, kaydany, ta palayuche Peklo
Yak dlya dobrochesni, vony vyp'yutʹ z chashok spiced z nektarom
vesna shcho rezervuyetʹsya dlya BOZHYKH sluzhbovtsiv; tse khlyne tomu shcho vony budutʹ
Vony fulfill yikhni zastavy, ta povaha denʹ tse nadzvychayno tyazhko
Vony daruyutʹ yikhnye ulyublene prodovolʹstvo do bidnoho, syroty, ta v'yaznya
My hoduyemo vas zarady BOHA; my ne ochikuyemo vynahorody vid vas, ne spasybi
My bo z nashoho Lorda denʹ tse povno neshchastya ta nespokoyu
Otzhe, BOH zakhyshchaye yikh z zla shcho dnya, ta nahorodzhuye yikh z radistyu ta contentment
Vin nahorodzhuye yikh dlya yikhnʹoho steadfastness z Rayem, ta shovkom
Vony rozslablyayutʹsya tam na rozkishnomu vbranni. Vony strazhdayutʹ niyake teplo sontsya, ne budʹ-yakoho kholodnoho
tinʹ nakryvaye yikh tam, ta frukty prynosyatʹsya poruch
Vony sluzhatʹsya napiy u sribnykh konteynerakh ta chashkakh tse - translucent
Translucent chashky, khoch zrobyly sribla; vony pravylʹno zasluzhyly vse tse
Vony polyublyayutʹ napiy duzhe smachnykh smaku
Z vesny tam znav yak "Salsabeel
